Text.Page:
The eldritch vanquishers and their minions are slaughtering us. We can't get runners past them, most of the conscripts are deadâ€”we need someone with your skills.

Be wary. The vanquishers are damnably tough.

I know these crests! They're Killian's tokens.

That explains much. The sikandaris and mekonaris couldn't hope to hold us off on their own. Killian's augmenting their strength. They must be vulnerable right now.
Get out there and cut those vanquishers down like reeds.
